comment: I donate to @Mermaids_Gender and @mamacash. If you can, perhaps you’ll feel inclined to do the same. ❤️
original_tweet: I want my trans followers to know that I and so many other people around the world see you, respect you and love you for who you are.

comment: I want my trans followers to know that I and so many other people around the world see you, respect you and love you for who you are.
original_tweet: Trans people are who they say they are and deserve to live their lives without being constantly questioned or told they aren’t who they say they are.

comment: @G7 @10DowningStreet @BorisJohnson Every week, two women in England and Wales are killed by their current or former partner. To date, 34 states in the Council of Europe have ratified the Istanbul Convention.📝❤ Let’s not drag our feet on this any longer, @10DowningStreet! Let’s be number 35!
original_tweet: @G7 @10DowningStreet @BorisJohnson ⚖️The Istanbul Convention makes govts responsible for combating violence against women & domestic violence. 🌹I’ll be proud to say my country is committed to preventing violence against women when the UK govt ratifies the Istanbul Convention & fully complies w/ its requirements.

comment: @G7 @10DowningStreet @BorisJohnson ⚖️The Istanbul Convention makes govts responsible for combating violence against women & domestic violence. 🌹I’ll be proud to say my country is committed to preventing violence against women when the UK govt ratifies the Istanbul Convention & fully complies w/ its requirements.
original_tweet: @G7 @10DowningStreet @BorisJohnson 🌎 We're asking states to ratify all relevant gender equality standards: https://t.co/7qdNRAZQLf 🌍 There are some incredible global treaties & conventions that set minimum standards for women's & girls’ rights 🥀 but some G7 states haven’t yet stepped up & made them a reality.
